localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: A bot who helps to monitor Elon's twitter and notify you instantly via Discord app. You no longer have to keep refreshing on his twitter, or mess up your twitter notifications to just follow him.
nodes.title: Trade on Elon Tweets - Never missed any tweet, go buying before everyone knows.
nodes.author: Tony Phung

nodes.excerpt: Alinea is a mobile investing app for the next generation. We match you to stocks based on your interests and offer bite-sized insights so you can invest in the companies you believe in. Join the waitlist to reserve a spot!
nodes.title: Alinea - Invest in stocks you believe in
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
nodes.title: ICONFi - Keep your savings simple with ICONFi.
nodes.author: Molly Waldron

nodes.excerpt: Lendtable gives employees the cash to max out their full 401(k) match and employee stock purchase plan (ESPP). Sign up in 3 minutes to start earning thousands of dollars a year from your employee benefits.
nodes.title: Lendtable - We give you the money to max out your employee benefits
nodes.author: Nathan Baschez

nodes.excerpt: CFO Yeah! brings you up close with finance leaders in the most exciting, fastest-growing companies in the world. In each episode, you meet CFOs who believe that finance is another key driver for growth - just as vital as sales and marketing.
nodes.title: CFO Yeah! - Your new favorite finance podcast
nodes.author: Patrick Whatman

nodes.excerpt: Our app is simple! When Elon mentions a stock in a tweet, weâ€™ll send you a text ğŸ“² Itâ€™s like insider trading, but legal ğŸ’¯ STONKS to the MOON ğŸš€ğŸš€ğŸš€
nodes.title: Elon Stocks - Trade on Elon's tweets to make money ğŸ’°
nodes.author: Sharath Kuruganty

nodes.excerpt: Logica helps finance teams with forecasting. Save time by building a financial model visually and connect tools like QuickBooks and ProfitWell to compare plan vs. actual.
nodes.title: Logica - Build a financial model in a drag-and-drop canvas
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Exclusive selection of the most important news in fintech delivered to your inbox weekly. All of the news, none of the useless filler.
nodes.title: Fintech Digest - Exclusive selection of fintech's most important news
nodes.author: Matas

nodes.excerpt: Stonksfolio is a free community-supported project that makes it easy to track multiple stock, ETF and crypto investments in a single place. â € It shows historical performance and a number of useful metrics that can help you decide how to tune your investments.
nodes.title: Stonksfolio - Gain insight into the performance of stock & ETF investments
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Watch for GME squeeze updates!
nodes.title: Is The Squeeze Squoze? - Is GME Squoze Yet?
nodes.author: Jeff Needles

nodes.excerpt: ZelaaPayAE crypto cards allow for transactions online and in brick-and-mortar establishments at market rates, backed by our cryptocurrency ZPAE. With the ZPAYae card, you can immediately exchange fiat to crypto and then pay directly for your goods or send it to a friend.
nodes.title: ZPAE Crypto Card - Pay with ZPAE Card around the world at 40,000,000+ merchants
nodes.author: Vishal Sharma

nodes.excerpt: Check is a payroll-as-a-service API that lets you embed payroll directly in your product. We provide all the building blocks for full-featured payroll, including a powerful API, modular white-label onboarding components, and a partner dashboard.
nodes.title: Check - Embed payroll in your product
nodes.author: Nathan Baschez

nodes.excerpt: https://www.wingspan.app/ erases all the worst parts of freelancingâ€“ taxes, benefits, accounting, invoice & expense tracking, registering an LLC, even your tax withholdings. The ease and beauty of a payroll platform, but optimized for freelancers and independent professionals.
nodes.title: Wingspan - Invoices, benefits, and taxes for independent professionals
nodes.author: Nick Abouzeid

nodes.excerpt: Perch allows you to use your existing recurring expenses such as rent, Hulu and Spotify as credit worthy data to boost your credit score. â € Now available on the iOS App Store!
nodes.title: Perch Credit - Use recurring expenses to boost your credit score
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Abacum is a financial planning tool for mid-sized companies. Save time by integrating data sources and automating manual processes. Generate better insights with analytical tools built for finance-users. Collaborate easily across teams and locations.
nodes.title: Abacum - Helping finance teams deliver business insights 10x faster
nodes.author: Lindsay Wiese-Amos

nodes.excerpt: Unbox a wide variety of Income Tax, GST, TDS & KYC APIs to build ambitious E-Commerce, Fintechs, NBFCs, Payment Gateways, and much more
nodes.title: Sandbox - Tax compliance APIs for India
nodes.author: Team Quicko

nodes.excerpt: Datrics helps FinTech companies build and deploy machine learning models without writing code. Analysts and domain experts leverage a drag-n-drop interface to enable self-service analytics.
nodes.title: Datrics - Create a better credit-risk model in days without coding
nodes.author: Lindsay Wiese-Amos

nodes.excerpt: Create your personal page and sell your services for Instagram and TikTok. Easily manage collaborations, receive messages from brands, and get paid directly to your bank account.
nodes.title: Collabstr - A personal page to sell your Instagram & TikTok services
nodes.author: Clayton Rannard

nodes.excerpt: GetMyInvoices is the central invoice management software for your company. The solution automatically retrieves invoices & other documents from thousands of sources â€“ from portals over email postboxes and cloud storages to scanned documents. 14 Days FREE Trial
nodes.title: GetMyInvoices.com - Automatically retrieve invoices & docs from thousand sources
nodes.author: GetMyInvoices

nodes.excerpt: The YouTuber ATM machine. Creator Cash allows you to access YouTube earnings immediately. No more waiting an entire month to get paid. Uploaded a video today? Get paid today! Coupled with earnings analytics, Creator Cash is the financial hub for YouTubers.
nodes.title: Creator Cash - The app for creators to get paid without waiting
nodes.author: Ken Yeung

nodes.title: Laguna - OnlyFans for your stock portfolio
nodes.author: Gideon Tay Yee Chuen

nodes.excerpt: Neverlose.money is the first-ever gamified DeFi protocol that pays a bonus to long-term investors, known as HODLers, using the penalty charge paid by users who fail to HODL.
nodes.title: Neverlose.money - A DeFi protocol that lets you invest crypto like Mr. Buffett
nodes.author: Younghwi Cho

nodes.excerpt: Craftgate, a cloud-based payment gateway, provides you safe processing through a single integration and allows you on growing your business.
nodes.title: Craftgate - Cloud-based payment gateway
nodes.author: Hakan ERDOGAN

nodes.excerpt: Bitbo is a real-time Bitcoin dashboard that allows anyone to monitor on-chain data, view live price action, and track key economic indicators - all for free.
nodes.title: Bitbo - Real-time Bitcoin dashboard
nodes.author: Christopher Gimmer
